resources.string: Shake will unlock from sleep (may impact battery life)
Security Pattern - Pattern lock will be turned off while myLock is running and forced on at reboot. Idle Lock does not work unless you set a pattern first.
Require lockscreen when waking via sliding the keypad slider open
Waking via sliding keypad open will auto unlock
Advanced mode - volume and camera (and trackball on the nexus one) will wake and unlock.

myLock automatically minimizes the lockscreen. Side buttons remain locked down, but waking the phone with the slider, keypad buttons, or power key will auto unlock. If the phone reboots while myLock is running, it will start back up automatically with your preferred settings. Do not attempt to change the security pattern or create one while myLock is enabled. Always uncheck enabled first.
myLock automatically minimizes the lockscreen. Side buttons remain locked down, but waking the phone with the slider, keypad buttons, or power key will auto unlock.
If the phone reboots while myLock is running, it will start back up automatically with your preferred settings.
Do not attempt to change the security pattern or create one while myLock is enabled. Always uncheck enabled first.

Please see our faq and troubleshooting pages linked on our site (mylockandroid.blogspot.com) first. If you notice an issue that happens consistently, download Log Collector (free from the market) to email us at myLockandroid@gmail.com. Be sure to list the problem symptoms and what other services are running in the Settings->Applications->Running Services screen. I will research the cause of the trouble and code a fix when possible.
Each time the phone sleeps, the timer begins. If left asleep for the amount of time set, pattern security is restored, disabling myLock. When you unlock the pattern, myLock restarts itself.
IMPORTANT: Enable the security pattern and set myLock to secure mode before configuring idle lock.
